<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Limited">[Staff Acrobat](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=37)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

You can perform amazing acts in and out of combat when you have a spear, staff, or polearm.

<document level="2" id="feat-1193" />

name: Staff Acrobat
prerequisite: Dexterity 16; Trained in Acrobatics; Trained in Athletics; trained with at least one of the following weapons: staff, bo staff, halfling sling staff, or any weapon in the spear or polearm group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”)
prerequisite_markdown: Dexterity 16; Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); trained with at least one of the following weapons: [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [halfling sling staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=78), or any weapon in the [spear](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=14) or [polearm](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=11) group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”)

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #151: The Show Must Go On](/Sources.aspx?ID=21) pg. 75</row>

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 16; Trained in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3); trained with at least one of the following weapons: [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [halfling sling staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=78), or any weapon in the [spear](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=14) or [polearm](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=11) group (referred to in this archetype as “your staff”)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You can perform amazing acts in and out of combat when you have a spear, staff, or polearm.
</summary>
